pageContext.claim: “Mike Pompeo is doing a great job, I am very proud of him. His predecessor, Rex Tillerson, didn't have the mental capacity needed. He was dumb as a rock and I couldn't get rid of him fast enough. He was lazy as hell. Now it is a whole new ballgame, great spirit at State!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump lavished praise on Tillerson while he was secretary of state, so this "dumb as a rock" comment qualifies as a flip-flop.
